content: Narendra Damodardas Modi (born 17 September 1950) is an Indian politician who has served as the prime minister of India since 2014. Modi was the chief minister ... . (More: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Narendra_Modi)
Good morning! You're looking up information on Narendra Modi, the current Prime Minister of India.
He is the chief executive officer (CEO) of Alphabet Inc. and its subsidiary Google. Sundar Pichai. Pichai in 2023. Born. . (More: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sundar_Pichai)
You're referring to Sundar Pichai, the CEO of Alphabet Inc. and Google. Born in 1972, he took the helm in 2023.

MRF, or MRF Tyres, is an Indian multinational tyre manufacturing company and the largest manufacturer of tyres in India. It is headquartered in Chennai. The acronym MRF comes from the company's initial days when it was called as Madras Rubber...   Wikipedia . (More: https://www.carlogos.org/tire-brands/mrf-logo.html)
MRF Tyres, India's largest tyre manufacturer, headquartered in Chennai. The name MRF originates from its early days as Madras Rubber Factory.
